Text.val: 06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
18.12.2007 AK SCR13233 fix bug in q.LGCC_AMOUNTC and q.LGCC_AMOUNTH pictue

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/LGCC LGCC, :1/LDGR LDGR, :1/ADMU ADMU where LGCC.LGCC_LDGR_NO = LDGR.LDGR_NO and LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = LDGR.LDGR_ADMNO and LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_DATE between ':2' and ':3' and LDGR.LDGR_TRANSACTIONTYPE = 1 and LGCC.LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO = ADMU.ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU.ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_LEDGER = 'Y' and ADMU.ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':4'

select LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO, LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_DATE, LGCC.LGCC_PROGID, LGCC.LGCC_LDGR_NO, LGCC.LGCC_JOURNALID, LGCC.LGCC_AMOUNTC, LGCC.LGCC_CURRENCY, LGCC.LGCC_AMOUNTH, LGCC.LGCC_DESCRIPTION from :1/LGCC LGCC, :1/LDGR LDGR, :1/ADMU ADMU where LGCC.LGCC_LDGR_NO = LDGR.LDGR_NO and LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = LDGR.LDGR_ADMNO and LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_DATE between ':2' and ':3' and LDGR.LDGR_TRANSACTIONTYPE = 1 and LGCC.LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO = ADMU.ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU.ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_LEDGER = 'Y' and ADMU.ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':4' order by LGCC.LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_DATE, LGCC.LGCC_LDGR_NO
